.. title:: CHERAB-Inversion documentation


==============================
CHERAB-Inversion documentation
==============================
Welcome to the CHERAB-Inversion's documentation.
This package offers Inversion specific features like tomographic reconstructions.

Please note that this package is under development,
so this documentation is gradually updated, and welcome your contribution.

**Useful links**:
`Source Repository`_ |
`Issue Tracker`_ |
:ref:`contribution`

   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:

   API Reference <api>

        API Reference
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^

        The reference guide contains a detailed description of the functions,
        modules, and objects included in CHERAB-Inversion. The reference describes how the
        methods work and which parameters can be used. It assumes that you have an
        understanding of the key concepts.

        +++

        .. button-ref:: api
            :expand:
            :color: secondary
            :click-parent:

            To the reference guide
